text:
In this video, we will
show you how to download
MC Command Center for The Sims 4.
We are downloading on Mac,

but downloading on PC is
a very similar process.

MC Command Center is a
mod that allows players
to change and help their Sims with actions

like changing age,
increasing funds, and more.
To start, go to this website,
also linked in the description below.
Go to "MCCC Downloads" and you'll see
all the versions of the mod available.

Click the latest version
to start downloading.
When the download is completed,
extract all the contents of the zip file.

Next, go to the "Mods" folder
in the Sims 4-based directory.

This can be located by
going to "Documents,"
"Electronic Arts," and then "Sims 4."

Copy the MC Command Center
contents in the download folder
and paste them into the "Mods" folder.
Launch Sims 4 and a popup should appear,
confirming a mod is installed.

If not, you may need to
enable mods for your client.

To check this, go to the three
dots on the launch screen
and go to "Game Options" and then "Other."
Ensure "Enable Custom Content and Mods"

and also "Script Mods"
are checked off here.
The game will need to be restarted
if these were not on already.

When ready, hit play and
you'll be able to enjoy
the mod's functions within your game.

Click on your Sim and
choose MC Command Center.

This will pull up a menu of
ways to change or help your Sim.
For example, we can change age

by going to "Sims Commands"
and clicking "Set Age."
